title: UCI weighs in on Van Schip Baloise Belgium Tour disqualification
content:
The UCI has issued a statement clarifying the disqualification of Jan Willem Van Schip (Beat Cycling) from the Baloise Belgium Tour for use of Speedcoâ€™s ABB handlebars.
